channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Amazon is beating other retailers on price, but here’s how you can beat Amazon

item.title: AI2 closes the gap between closed-source and open-source post-training
item.description: Ai2 released Tülu 3, a model that makes fine-tuning open-source LLMs easier and get its performance closer to closed LLMs like GPT-4o.
